instructions: Place dinner fork on the left lowered facing up
Place the dinner knife right lowered facing up
place the salad fork on the left side of the dinner fork facing up
place the salad knife next to the dinner knife on the right facing up
place the soup spoon next to the salad knife facing up
place the dessert spoon in between the knife and fork, upward facing the left
place the dessert spoon next to the soup spoon
place the dessert spoon back where it was
place the dinner plate between the dinner fork and the dinner knife, underneath the dessert spoon
place the bread plate next to the dessert spoon, in front of the forks
place the butter knife on the upward left of the bread plate at an angle
place the wine glass in front of the soup spoon
place the water glass next to the dessert spoon and wine glass
place the napkin in the center of the dinner plate
